titles.title: Joliet Park District Enhancement Act of 2000
To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey certain real property in the city of Joliet, Illinois, to the Joliet Park District for use as the park district's headquarters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/5/2000--Introduced. Joliet Park District Enhancement Act of 2000 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey the parcel of real property located at 622 Railroad Street in Joliet, Illinois, together with any improvements, to the Joliet Park District for public ownership and use as the site of its headquarters.Provides that armed forces provisions regarding the screening of real property for further Federal use before conveyance shall not apply to such conveyance.
